string.text: Designed for high-quality marching troop repair equipment.
Designed for setup and calibration of army equipment.
Professional set of tools for fine repair and modernization detectors. What is included in the kit is sufficient for any work on setting up and modernization of all types of detectors.
Tools for use with the detectors
Stitched stepplerom, several sheets of A4. The inscription on the cover: \n 'Merge anomalous rock' \n S/N 1264

Sticky Information: A group of mercenaries detained by our agent in the vicinity of Jupiter. There is reason to believe that our agent is still alive. Your goal - the liberation of the agent and the neutralization of mercenaries who resisted. For safe passage into the camp - use 'Coverall mercenary '. \n To download the data in the PDA - should be used.
In the letter it says: Major Degtyarev. You need to urgently meet with connected power in the territory. Callsign - 'How is your fillet?'.
Halogen lamp and optical sight mounted in a common housing.
Inside the case is parsed 'Ruger GP100', as well as repair kit to it.
Used by the MOE, universal medical kit with defibrillator.
Medium-format analog camera with a tripod hard Attachments.
Rare drink, at least within the zone.
Is used for communication over vast distances. Manufactured in Germany.
Specialized army binoculars. Included in the equipment of military snipers.
Another miracle is born within the zone.
A large medical kit. Copes with any injury or bleeding.

The letter listed the following: '... you're the first one who saw me ... I'm saved a life ... in exchange for silence and ... and help. Help me ... I can not appear among the people, but I know that scientists certainly have what I need ... NG-7. Bring me this drug. It will help me. And I thank you enough. ' \n To download the data in the PDA - should be used.
The letter listed the following: 'Thank you. Look into my box, it is at the end of the corridor. There's your reward.'
Ozersky did not say anything about this drug, but I believe that this drug stops the mutation.

%c[255,238,153,26] The team leader auxiliary facilities. %c[default] Order - all support groups! Provide support to groups of special forces or possibly himself - to capture dead or alive Degtyarev Alexander G born in 1978,a native of the town of Pripyat Ukraine. Features:,thin build-looking 25-30 years,height - 179 cm,, hair wavy light brown. Wanted,Major SBU All items found during it,immediately deliver to the center. Pay special attention to the safety of the flash-drive,paper and electronic media. 5 times the reward for the successful execution of the task!

Wanted,Major SBU All items found during it,immediately deliver to the center. Pay special attention to the safety of the flash-drive,paper and electronic media. 10 fold reward for the successful execution of the task!

Wanted,Major SBU All items found during it,immediately deliver to the center. PDA with valuable information for stalkers.
PDA with valuable information for stalkers.
PDA with valuable information for stalkers.
PDA with valuable information for stalkers.
flash-drive leader of mercenaries. Information from the flash-drive: Our password - 'raskukozhenaya cuckoo.'
Case intercepted agent at Monolith mercenaries. Leon asked to bring a case in Pripyat, without opening it.
PDA contains the zipped file archive is password protected. My PDA does not support this version of the archiver. You need to pass the PDA Stormbreaker - perhaps he can extract information.
Personal arms. Achieved under the order, the handle flaunts the inscription 'Chapa'.
Unique artifact with excellent barrier properties. You must take his breeder ... sorry.
Unique artifact with good protective and restorative properties. However emits radiation. You need to pass an artifact Krivouhovu.
According stalker Petka Pechkin, inside is a license fee. Recipient - Markovic saver on Skadovsk.
What Avenger disparagingly called the 'fireworks' really looks like a well-packed charge of C-4 with the detonator. Beneficiary - 'dolgovets' Kanev.
On the handle of submachine gun engraved. You can make out only 'for the excellent sl..bu ... ..' and someone's initials' AS P.shk.n '.
Old shabby automatic, with traces of someone's claws on the butt. Weapons, about which legends. In particular - said that he tagged killed out of him last in the Zone 'break.'

Judging from the appearance, this weapon long trampled into the ground; And, most likely, in the vicinity of 'agricultural industry.' Factory inscription on the butt says that it is a shotgun from a limited batch differs by more qualitative burnished.

Weapons for these commandos. Above this weapon worked technician who knows his business, significantly improve the combat characteristics. According to rumors, it was a screw - the legendary craftsman with 'military warehouse.'

Special development scientists. Equipped with a locator anomalous formations and LED display to show the direction of the unknown sample, with not only able to detect patterns, but also to determine the distance to them. The search mode is activated samples lifting the lid antenna on the front side of the device.
Radioactive. The properties of the artifact virtually nothing is known.
Artifact of organic nature. Consists of a deformed animal tissues. When injected into the area of chemical pollution begins 'pull' chemicals from the air and convert it into a thick viscous mass.
It is well established that the radiation produced by ripple thickening of this breed, causes blood in open wounds very quickly phased out.
The organic artifact with unique properties. Yet unknown way increases the overall speed of regeneration after injury of any nature, without accelerating the accumulation of toxins.
Artifact electrostatic nature. Can dramatically increase the muscle tone of the carrier.
Generates around itself the sphere of directions of the gravitational field. Very effective in reducing the weight of the contents of the rucksack carrier.
The organic artifact. Generates around itself invisible sphere, which boosts immunity carrier.

Key bandits. Is used to open the safe.
Army cargo. Inside contains a chemical unknown to me. Need to pass it to the SBU.
The most important part of any mine detector.
It can help you to find and defuse mines hidden under the ground.
With the help of GPR can find any piece of iron, no matter how deep underground it may be. Detection radius - 30 meters.
Information from the flash-drive: 'Thank you for the work done, the money will take the forest near our Iron Man'.
Information from the flash-drive: 'Five of the charges laid in the five points of possible occurrence of an agent of the SBU, the money ready for transfer.'
Special kit for neutralization of charges.
Special scanner for DF charges. Search radius - 50 meters.
The drug developed by scientists to combat psy-radiation.
The drug developed by scientists to combat psy-radiation.
Information from the flash-drive: 'People for the protection of almost gone. Mutants attack everything with renewed vigor. Tomorrow will come back.'
Information from the flash-drive: 'The drug is almost done, it remains to test it. The group received the drug went to the center location for his trial.'

Information from the flash-drive: 'preparty was applied to a group of protection, performance surprised us. Everything went very well. The second we invented a drug to reduce the activity of the psy-supervisor has been applied to the entrapment us Controllers, but unfortunately his psychic activity has not decreased, and vice versa increased several times. '
